justification: “Narcissism was assessed by the FFNI (Five-Factor Narcissism Inventory)”
“we additionally used the BPNI (Brief Pathological Narcissism Inventory), a 28-item version of the Pathological Narcissism Inventory”
“Depression was assessed by the DASS-21 depression subscale in Sample 1”
“Depression was assessed by … the Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression (HRSD) in Sample 2”

measured_by: International Personality Item Pool – Dominance Subscale (IPIP-DS)
justification: “Trait dominance was assessed in Sample 2 only by the IPIP-DS (International Personality Item Pool -Dominance Subscale)”
“we … investigated whether specific dimensions of narcissism were driving the observed behavioral effects in an exploratory analysis including grandiose … subscales of both the FFNI”
same sentence notes examination of “vulnerable subscales of both the FFNI”
the authors mention analyzing “the agentic extraversion … subscales of the FFNI”
the exploratory analysis included “antagonism … subscales of the FFNI”
the same list includes “narcissistic neuroticism subscales of the FFNI”
exploratory analysis tested “grandiose … subscales of both the FFNI and the BPNI”
the analysis also included “vulnerable subscales of both the FFNI and the BPNI”
